front.title: IEEE Standard for a High Performance Serial Bus Peer-to-Peer Data Transport Protocol (PPDT)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines a peer-to-peer data transport (PPDT) protocol between Serial Bus devices that implement Serial Bus Protocol 2 (SBP-2). The facilities specified include device and service discovery, self-configurable (plug and play) binding, and connection management.
